sub_title: Trainer and consultant in international marketing, trade promotion and sustainable business development
summary:
Add value to your international trade promotion and online marketing 

:: Do you dare to be different?
I do! In my training, coaching and consultancy, I use good practices as a reference framework, but I always work with clients to develop customized solutions. Solutions that are sustainable, innovative and a comfort fit. 

:: A blend of experience and innovation power
I got my Masters degree in international development studies and international economic relations and have worked for more than 20 years as a consultant and trainer in the field of international marketing, online marketing, market research and market information, trade promotion, business development, corporate social responsibility, and development cooperation. I have done so in more than 40 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa and Latin America, and always as an advocate of creation of shared value, based on the triple P bottom line: People, Planet and Profit.

:: A committed energizer
Among my client organizations are United Nations, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, national and international development organisations, trade promotion organisations, international associations, management consultancy firms and other private companies.

I generate added value to trade promotion bodies around the world with new revenue streams, online services and tools, trade promotion portals, branding and promotion campaigns and more. I also develop training curricula and conduct train the trainer programs. Over the years I have trained more than 5,000 entrepreneurs and trade promotion and business support officials and managers.   

:: Get in touch
Do you want to experience the energy and innovative solutions? Get in touch. It will be a pleasure to get to know you and to serve you!
